Doc_Ser1 module

Doc_Ser1.charge_wallet(username, amount)[source]

Charges a customer’s wallet in the ‘customers’ table.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – The username of the customer.

  • amount (float) – The amount to be added to the wallet.

Returns:

A dictionary containing a status message.

Return type:

dict

Doc_Ser1.connect_to_db()[source]

Establishes a connection to the SQLite database.

Returns:

A connection object to the database.

Return type:

sqlite3.Connection

Doc_Ser1.create_customer_table()[source]

Creates the ‘customers’ table in the database if it does not exist.

Prints a success message if the table is created, or an error message if the table creation fails.

Doc_Ser1.deduct_wallet(username, amount)[source]

Deducts money from a customer’s wallet in the ‘customers’ table.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – The username of the customer.

  • amount (float) – The amount to be deducted from the wallet.

Returns:

A dictionary containing a status message.

Return type:

dict

Doc_Ser1.delete_customer(customer_id)[source]

Deletes a customer from the ‘customers’ table.

Parameters:

customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer to be deleted.

Returns:

A dictionary containing a status message.

Return type:

dict

Doc_Ser1.get_customer_by_username(username)[source]

Retrieves a customer by their username from the ‘customers’ table.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer.

Returns:

A dictionary representing the customer or an empty dictionary if not found.

Return type:

dict

Doc_Ser1.get_customers()[source]

Retrieves a list of all customers from the ‘customers’ table.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries, each representing a customer.

Return type:

list

Doc_Ser1.insert_customer(customer)[source]

Inserts a new customer into the ‘customers’ table.

Parameters:

customer (dict) – A dictionary containing customer information.

Returns:

A dictionary representing the inserted customer or an error message.

Return type:

dict

Doc_Ser1.update_customer(customer)[source]

Updates customer information in the ‘customers’ table.

Parameters:

customer (dict) – A dictionary containing updated customer information.

Returns:

A dictionary representing the updated customer or an empty dictionary if an error occurs.

Return type:

dict
